## Install

Uses `fp-ts` as a peer dependency.

```bash
yarn add fp-ts fp-ts-virtual-filesystem
```

or

```bash
npm install fp-ts fp-ts-virtual-filesystem
```

## Example

```ts
import * as Lib from 'fp-ts-virtual-filesystem'

// write an example...
```
